name: Dr. Emily Carter
description: Dr. Emily specializes in surgical procedures and post-operative care for small animals. Her calm and compassionate approach ensures every pet feels safe and loved.

name: Dr. Ryan Mitchell
description: Dr. Ryan focuses on balanced pet nutrition and helps owners plan customized diets for their furry friends during winter months.

name: Dr. Sarah Lopez
description: Dr. Sarah treats skin, fur, and allergy issues, especially common in cold, dry winter weather.

name: Dr. Jason Miller
description: With over a decade of experience, Dr. Jason provides comprehensive pet care and wellness checkups for dogs and cats.
